description:
The Calendar Tool plugin simplifies the creation of a custom calendar using a repeating group setup. It allows you to populate dates in a grid-like format, making it easy to display a monthly or weekly calendar view within your app. Perfect for apps that need to display dates in a calendar format, this tool integrates seamlessly with Bubble's repeating groups.

ðŸ”” For more advanced booking functionality check out our Calendar Time Slots plugin plugin: https://zeroqode.com/plugin/calendar-time-slots-plugin-for-bubble-1651737643910x893777033886920200                                                   

[b]Usage Features:[/b] 

- Easily populate a repeating group with date data to create a calendar view.
- Supports customization of rows and columns to match calendar layouts.
- Configurable to display dates based on start of the month or custom intervals.
- Flexible setup for displaying day labels (e.g., Mon, Tue) and date formatting.

name: Calendar tool
plugin_instructions:
Drag the Calendar tool element onto your page. It can be as small as you want it won't actually display anything on the page. 
Set the month date - this can be any date. The plugin will get all the days for whatever month this date is in. If you want to let the user switch dates, just have this field reference a state variable

Time date - This allows you to get a list of times for a specific date. if you don't want to use this feature, just set it to any random date.

Create a repeating group set to full width and 7 columns. Set the data source the the elements to be the list of dates from the Calendar tool element

The element also exposes the start of the month and the end of the month to help with hiding the extra dates needed to make the repeating group look correct.

All styling can be done in a bubble.
